collect(uint256,(bytes32,uint32,uint88,u.details: A fee is taken into the appropriate treasury.

params._feeBeneficiary: The beneficiary of the fee project's token.
params._nftBeneficiary: The beneficiary of the NFT mints.
params._posts: An array of posts that should be published as NFTs to the specified project.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to which the NFT should be added.

params._allowedPosts: An array of criteria for allowed posts.
params._projectId: The ID of the project having its publishing allowances set.

params._controller: The controller that directs the projects being posted to.
params._feeProjectId: The ID of the project to which fees will be routed.

params._encodedIPFSUris: The URIs to get tiers of.
params._nft: The NFT from which to get tiers.
params._projectId: The ID of the project from which the tiers are being sought.

returns.tiers: The tiers that correspond to the provided encoded IPFS URIs. If there's no tier yet, an empty tier is returned.

allowedCategoryFor(uint256,address,uint2.notice: A flag indicating if a category allows posts for each project. _projectId The ID of the project. _nft The NFT contract for which this allowance applies. _category The category.

collect(uint256,(bytes32,uint32,uint88,u.notice: Publish an NFT to become mintable, and mint a first copy.

configure(uint256,(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Project owners can set the allowed criteria for publishing a new NFT to their project.

controller().notice: The controller that directs the projects being posted to.

feeDivisor().notice: The divisor that describes the fee that should be taken.

feeProjectId().notice: The ID of the project to which fees will be routed.

minPostPriceFor(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The minimum accepted price for each post on each category. _projectId The ID of the project. _nft The NFT contract for which this minimum applies. _category The category.

minPostQuantityFor(uint256,address,uint2.notice: The minimum quantity of NFTs for each post on each category. _projectId The ID of the project. _nft The NFT contract for which this minimum applies. _category The category.

tierIdForEncodedIPFSUriOf(uint256,bytes3.notice: The ID of the tier that an IPFS metadata has been saved to. _projectId The ID of the project. _encodedIPFSUri The IPFS URI.

tiersFor(uint256,address,bytes32[]).notice: Get the tiers for the provided encoded IPFS URIs.
